mapper.insert: Insert into member( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, SALT ) values( #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{memberNo}, #{address}, #{salt}, )
